name: 1995 (vitaeo)
description:
WARNING: This game contains strong language, blood/gore, flashing lights, mentions of suicide, and loud sounds. Player discretion is advised.

The year is 1995; your first official year of summer camp. As a camp counselor, you must make this place feel like home. But what would you do if this trip was interrupted by the local urban legend? A group of former crime scene cleaners who have witnessed these brutal attacks for years trek their way into the monster's territory to protect Ohio and the lives lost in the city of Cincinnati.

There are 7 total endings possible in this game :)
The game is about 30 minutes to 1hr long.

Working on bug fixes right now<3 sorry for the inconvenience!!
